sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Legal Business Solicitation Act.

sections.heading: Any person who shall violate Section 1 shall be guilty of a Class B
Any contract of employment of an attorney obtained or made as a
sections.text: result of a violation of this Act shall be void and unenforceable.

sections.heading: This Act shall in no manner be construed as enlarging the
sections.text: privileges of attorneys at law as now permitted in this state.
